title: Unsuccessful in silver 5 promos

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
Due to some salty members in the last game I had played in ranked I was unable to rank up to silver 5. I had 2 wins and 2 losses, this game decided whether or not I would rank up. However in my last game I had died to the mid lane whilst taking scuttle and was abused for it, shortly after the talon on my team had began to feed the enemy on purpose without giving a reason other than you mad, after he fed 8 kills Shen left due to Talon. I honestly think that this it was unfair entirely and this isn't the first time it has happened in promos and other ranked games
If you care to see I have left a link above.
Has anyone else experience this kind of obnoxious behaviour in ranked or is it just me
And if there is actually anything I can do about this please let me know, other then reporting him
thanks

replies.body:
>other then reporting him

How do you expect that to happen? You can't report players that you also haven't been in game with.

Suggested reading: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules
